fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Mask: Choose a role to disguise as within the first phase of the game. You will appear to win with others according to the role you chose.
- Tough Skin: You are immune to Chaos faction’s Night phase attack.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Curios: Gain a card of your choice. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Trick: The next card you play will appear to come from a random player. [4 uses, 1 CD]
- Illusion: Choose a card related host message to send to the action-log. The message will not actually do anything. [4 uses, 1 CD, Post-Mortem]
- Time Skip: Skip the next phase. [1 use, Unique]
- Fake Death: Select a non-King player to “die” in the next phase. They will not actually die, and come back to the game in 2 phases. However, if the game would normally end if they were actually dead, the game ends when they “die”. [1 use, Unique, LOR6]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank and Outsider King.
